title: Emme Hall & Lyn Woodward (auto journalists, off-road rally competitors)
description:
Emme Hall and Lyn Woodward are automotive journalists and off-road enthusiasts. They will both be competing in the Rebelle Rally, a 2,000km multi-day all-women off-road rally held in the Nevada desert. In addition to driving, competitors have to navigate the whole course without using GPS.

Follow them: @mmmotorsports @lyn__woodward

Read about the rally: https://www.rebellerally.com/

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/a5U5GMhhzCc 

 

https://www.innova.com

CODE: TST

https://www.autotempest.com

https://www.sortedornot.com

www.offtherecord.com/tst
